<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stealthy Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=4900) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Animal Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=4708); [Camouflage](/Feats.aspx?ID=4887)

</column>

---

You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings. Your animal companion gains the benefit of the Camouflage feat. If your companion is a specialized ambusher, its proficiency rank for Stealth increases to master (or legendary if it was already master).
name: Stealthy Companion
